name: Info Isles
description:
Info isles is a resource gathering tower defense survival. It has waves that spawn with progressive difficulty. (it also takes place in Norway)

The game includes 4 worlds, 3 resources, 10 Buildings, 9 building upgrades and 5 different enemies.

None of the sprites used in the game belongs to me, all credit goes to the respective creators linked below. 

  • Overworld - Grass Biome https://beast-pixels.itch.io/overworld-tileset-grass-biome
  • Kyrise's Free 16x16 RPG Icon Pack https://kyrise.itch.io/kyrises-free-16x16-rpg-icon-pack
  • Keyboard and Controller 16 x https://hyohnoo.itch.io/keyboard-controller-keys
  • Tiny 16 https://sharm.itch.io/tiny1
  • 16x bit icons https://alexs-assets.itch.io/16x16-rpg-item-pack
